DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy cyclosporine ophthalmic emulsion administer twice daily follow LASIK surgery
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study Cyclosporine Ophthalmic Emulsion Post-LASIK Patients
DOC.criteria: Patient schedule bilateral LASIK surgery Patient good general health Eye glass prescription 1 8 Significant Dry Eye Presence eye disease Uncontrolled systemic disease
